SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.INCLUDE.AIWS_LOGGING_PARAMS
! Run book to run the Dimensions CM AIWS command through the DMCLI. :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.JOBI.CONNECTION@WINDOWS :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Ensure a product ID has been specified : IF &UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_PROD_ID#='' : P 'Specify a Product ID' : EXIT 1 : ENDIF
! Ensure a workset has been defined : IF &UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_WORKSET#='' : P 'Specify a workset' : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &WORKSET#='/WORKSET=&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_WORKSET#' : ENDIF
! Check that at least item id or filename has been specified : SET &FILENAME#='' : IF &UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_ITEM_ID#='' : IF &UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_FILENAME#='' : P 'You must specify at least item id or filename' : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &FILENAME#='/FILENAME=\\"""&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_FILENAME# \\"""' : ENDIF : ENDIF ! Create the item-spec : SET &ITEMSPEC#='\\"""&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_PROD_ID#:&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_ITEM_ID#.&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_VARIANT#-&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_ITEM_TYPE#;&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_REVISION#\\"""'
! Check if WS Filename has been set : SET &WS_FILENAME#='' : IF &UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_WSFILENAME#<>'' : SET &WS_FILENAME#='/WS_FILENAME=\\"""&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_WSFILENAME# \\"""' : ENDIF
! Check if hange Doc IDs have been set : SET &CHANGEDOCIDS#='' : IF &UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_CHANGEIDS#<>'' : SET &CHANGEDOCIDS#='/CHANGE_DOC_IDS=(&UC4RB_DMC_AIWS_CHANGEIDS#)' : ENDIF
&UC4RB_DMC_CMD# AIWS &ITEMSPEC# &WORKSET# &FILENAME# &WS_FILENAME# &CHANGEDOCIDS# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
